mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_info (seq, name, password, id, email, birth, gen, address, address_detail, phone) VALUES (#{seq},#{name}, #{password}, #{id}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gen}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{phone});
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_info where id=#{id}
select count(*) from member_info where email=#{email}
select count(*) from member_info where id= #{id} and password=#{pwd}
select seq, name, password, id, email, birth, gen, address, address_detail, phone, status from member_info where id=#{id}
